name: HOTSAX
full_name: Finding the Most Unusual Time Series Subsequence
paper: HOTSAX: Finding the Most Unusual Time Series Subsequence: Algorithms and Applications. ICDM
description: HOTSAX is a simple algorithm to find the discord in a significantly faster time than the brute force approach. It relies on the SAX representation of the time series.
bibtex: @INPROCEEDINGS{1565683,author={Keogh, E. and Lin, J. and Fu, A.},booktitle={Fifth IEEE International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM'05)}, title={HOT SAX: efficiently finding the most unusual time series subsequence}, year={2005},volume={},number={},pages={8 pp.-},doi={10.1109/ICDM.2005.79}}
